Question Asked: Can Brava fat grafting heal lymphedema?
Text of Question: 3/15dblmac remove15nodesleftcancerside left arm swelled I have stg1manageable lymphedema Dr Calva/Brava sent me followin: Fat grafting reverses lymphedema by stimulating new lymphatic channels within the axilla, preventing scarring in the axilla, and softening the axillary tissues. It is a buffer around the scar that is contracting your lymphatics, and as I release the scar tissue within your axilla, I place a small amount of fat between the scar fibers to prevent the scar from forming again
Question Header: Can Brava fat grafting heal lymphedema?
